channel.title: Create A Song For a Short Film! (Winners Announced)
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm making a short film with a few people I know and it's all about music. We will be using Auxy a lot, so I thought it'd be fun to make a contest out of it. The deadline will be March 21st for now (but I may extend it) Any genre is acceptable, but I'm looking for something that's chill and upbeat at the same time.
Thanks!

item.title: Create A Song For a Short Film! (Winners Announced)
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
The film should be done in a month(although we’re having slight difficulties right now) I will try to send the link as soon as its done!

Read full topic

item.source: Create A Song For a Short Film! (Winners Announced)

item.title: Create A Song For a Short Film! (Winners Announced)
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
Thank you so much to everyone who entered this contest it was honestly sooo much fun to listen to all of your tracks!

The winners are

1st: @Jax - forecast
https://soundcloud.com/jax-auxy/forecast
2nd: @El1011- Bobs video game ost…
https://m.soundcloud.com/xn-extras/bobs-video-game-ost-mountain
3rd: @davidnaha - Katki film 319
https://m.soundcloud.com/davidnaha/katki-film-319/s-LGtzL
4th: @tictacto - Falling Apart
https://soundcloud.com/xenocutter/falling-apart
Honorable Mention: @Fuujiya - Journey
https://m.soundcloud.com/fuujiya/journey

Thank you so much guys and congrats!

Read full topic
